description: Substitute Michael Jacobs earns Chesterfield a first League Two victory at Holker Street for 60 years to end rejuvenated Barrow's five-match unbeaten run.
title: Barrow 0-1 Chesterfield
maintext:
Barrow have lost just one of their last five Football League games against Chesterfield (W3 D1), though they did lose the reverse fixture 1-0 in November last year.
Chesterfield have won just one of their last 16 away Football League games against Barrow (D3 L12), a 2-1 victory in March 1965.
Barrow have won four of their last six home league games (L2), keeping a clean sheet in three of those victories.
Chesterfield have won each of their last two away league games and will be looking to win three on their travels in succession in the EFL for the first time since October 2015.
